verses.verse: Send <S%H7971><s%> the lambs <S%H3733><s%> for the ruler <S%H4910><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from Selah <S%H5554><s%> to the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

For it will be that as wandering <S%H5074><s%> birds, <S%H5775><s%> as a scattered <S%H7971><s%> nest, <S%H7064><s%> so will the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> be at the fords <S%H4569><s%> of the Arnon. <S%H769><s%>

Give counsel! <S%H6098><s%> Execute <S%H6213><s%> justice! <S%H6415><s%> Make <S%H7896><s%> your shade <S%H6738><s%> like the night <S%H3915><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the noonday! <S%H6672><s%> Hide <S%H5641><s%> the outcasts! <S%H5080><s%> Don't <S%H5074><s%> betray the fugitive!

Let my outcasts <S%H5080><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> with you! <S%H4124><s%> As for Moab, be <S%H1933><s%> a hiding <S%H5643><s%> place for him from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the destroyer. <S%H7703><s%> For the extortioner <S%H4160><s%> is brought to nothing. <S%H656><s%> Destruction <S%H7701><s%> ceases. <S%H3615><s%> The oppressors <S%H7429><s%> are consumed <S%H8552><s%> out of the land. <S%H776><s%>

A throne <S%H3678><s%> will be established <S%H3559><s%> in loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%> One will sit <S%H3427><s%> on it in truth, <S%H571><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> judging, <S%H8199><s%> seeking <S%H1875><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> and swift <S%H4106><s%> to do righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> that he is very <S%H3966><s%> proud; <S%H1341><s%> even of his arrogance, <S%H1347><s%> his pride, <S%H1347><s%> and his wrath. <S%H5678><s%> His boastings are nothing. <S%H907><s%>

Therefore Moab <S%H4124><s%> will wail <S%H3213><s%> for Moab. <S%H4124><s%> Everyone will wail. <S%H3213><s%> You will mourn <S%H1897><s%> for the raisin cakes <S%H808><s%> of Kir Hareseth, <S%H7025><s%> utterly stricken. <S%H5218><s%>

For the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> languish <S%H535><s%> with the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah. <S%H7643><s%> The lords <S%H1167><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> have broken down <S%H1986><s%> its choice branches, <S%H8291><s%> which reached <S%H5060><s%> even to Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> which wandered <S%H8582><s%> into the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> Its shoots <S%H7976><s%> were spread abroad. <S%H5203><s%> They passed over <S%H5674><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Therefore I will weep <S%H1058><s%> with the weeping <S%H1065><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%> for the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah. <S%H7643><s%> I will water <S%H7301><s%> you with my tears, <S%H1832><s%> Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh: <S%H500><s%> for on your summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> and on your harvest <S%H7105><s%> the battle shout <S%H1959><s%> has fallen. <S%H5307><s%>

Gladness <S%H8057><s%> is taken away, <S%H622><s%> and joy <S%H1524><s%> out of the fruitful field; <S%H3759><s%> and in the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> there will be no singing, <S%H7442><s%> neither joyful noise. <S%H7321><s%> Nobody will tread <S%H1869><s%> out <S%H1869><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in the presses. <S%H3342><s%> I have made the shouting <S%H1959><s%> stop. <S%H7673><s%>
Therefore my heart <S%H4578><s%> sounds <S%H1993><s%> like a harp <S%H3658><s%> for Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and my inward parts <S%H7130><s%> for Kir Heres. <S%H7025><s%>

It will happen that when Moab <S%H4124><s%> presents <S%H7200><s%> himself, <S%H3811><s%> when he wearies himself on the high place, <S%H1116><s%> and comes <S%H935><s%> to his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to pray, <S%H6419><s%> that he will not prevail. <S%H3201><s%>
This is the word <S%H1697><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> concerning Moab <S%H4124><s%> in time past. <S%H227><s%>

But now Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Within three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> as a worker bound by contract <S%H7916><s%> would count <S%H8141><s%> them, <S%H3519><s%> the glory of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be brought into contempt, <S%H7034><s%> with all his great <S%H7227><s%> multitude; <S%H1995><s%> and the remnant <S%H7605><s%> will be very <S%H4592><s%> small <S%H4213><s%> and feeble. <S%H3808><s%>"
